AvailableUpdate.ReleaseNotes: - Initial public release. - Theme changes. Backgrounds available. - Finalized controls UI and behavior. - Multiple bug fixes.

- New installer. - New downloader with pause/resume support. - Huge number of bug fixes. - Updated Help. - Updated custom controls behavior. - Allow multiple instances of ff7. - Updated Game Driver to 1.0.0.4.
- Updated Game Driver to 1.0.0.3. - Fixes movie playback and adds debug options. - Catalogs now support iros://ExternalURL - Fix registry bug.

- Fixed mod updating. - Fixed bugs for other regions. - Quieter download logs. - Fixed error message display. - UI and settings tweaks. - Better ISO dismount. - Default to custom controls if found. - Offer to terminate on 'Play' if FF7 already running.

- Update mod feature implemented. UI on mod info panel. - Initial mod/catalog creation tool implemented. - Remove 'Keep Old Versions of Mods' option. - Add 'Auto Update Mods by Default' option. - Fix possible unhandled exception in Mega downloader.
- Fixed bug w/ Mega downloads not starting. - Fixed crash on mod auto-import. - Updated 3rd party libraries. - Update check implemented.
